references.paper_title: Contextual bandit learning with predictable rewards
references.reason: This paper is foundational for contextual bandits, a core topic of this paper

references.paper_title: Online learning with feedback graphs: Beyond bandits
references.reason: This paper is highly influential in establishing the fundamental limits of learning in multi-armed bandits with graph feedback, a direct precursor to this paper’s contextual bandit setting

references.paper_title: Nonstochastic multi-armed bandits with graph-structured feedback
references.reason: This paper extends the results of Alon et al. (2015) to the adversarial setting and provides further insights into the role of graph structure in bandit problems
This paper introduces the concept of cross-learning in contextual bandits, which is directly relevant to the setting considered in this paper
This paper extends the study of graph feedback to reinforcement learning, providing a related framework and some results that inform the current work
